rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0001
rows.name: What's that-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0002
rows.name: No way[ST:wide ]â€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Moving object approach warning!
An object with such a large mass!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0004
rows.name: It's huge-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's bigger than the Nopon's legendary sacred place,
Frontier Village-meh!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0006
rows.name: It's not transmitting an Earth-standard IFF signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0007
rows.name: Consider it hostile. Take cover![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0008
rows.name: Fancy meeting you in a place like this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Before I burn the city, how about I thoroughly repay you
for our last encounter, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0010
rows.name:
With such a huge frame, it's undoubtedly an annihilation weapon.
Its destination is probably NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0012
rows.name:
We can't let it burn NLA.
Everyone, we'll stop it here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs10070100_SEL0011
rows.name: Swear to defeat it here, no matter what.

rows.label: xs10070100_JNK0020
rows.name: Show Fear

rows.label: xs10070100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look around for an escape route.

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0013
rows.name:
I thought you'd say that.
I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0014
rows.name: Let's protect NLA ourselves![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0015
rows.name:
There's nowhere to run anymore!
Let's fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0016
rows.name: We're the ones who protect NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0017
rows.name:
They're admirable, aren't they?
Is that what you call desperate resolve?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0018
rows.name: Riiz. Underestimating them isn't good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Shut up!
A dunce like you should just shut up and watch, yo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10070100_MSG0020
rows.name: Now, you damn humans, turn to cinders![ST:wait ]
